title: Nvidia to invest up to $100B in OpenAI
description: Artificial intelligence company OpenAI and Nvidia announced a $100 billion investment deal to deploy 10 gigawatts to power data centers beginning in 2026.
content:
Chipmaker Nvidia plans to invest up to $100 billion in artificial intelligence firm OpenAI, the companies announced on Monday.
A letter of intent said the partnership will allow OpenAI to build and deploy at least 10 gigawatts of AI data centers with... [1227 chars]

title: Nvidia to Invest $100 Billion in OpenAI
description: The chipmaker’s investment in the San Francisco start-up is an indication of the wild financial figures being tossed around in the world of artificial intelligence.
content: Nvidia, the world’s most valuable publicly traded company, said on Monday that it would invest $100 billion in OpenAI, a deal that will allow the start-up behind ChatGPT to use the chipmaker’s artificial intelligence semiconductors inside its data ce... [1344 chars]

title: Chipmaker Nvidia to invest $100 billion in OpenAI
description: ChapGPT parent OpenAI is set to receive a $100 billion investment from chip giant Nvidia, helping cement the two firms as leaders in the race to build artificial intelligence systems that could transform the economy and society.
content:

title: CEO's in leadership shakeup
description: Oracle said two of its long-time executives will run the artificial intelligence giant in dual co-CEO roles in a company shakeup.
content:
Sept. 22 (UPI) -- Oracle said Monday it appointed two of its long-time executives to run the artificial intelligence giant in dual roles as co-CEO.
The Texas-headquarted multinational company said Clay Magouyrk and Mike Sicilia will take over as co-C... [1493 chars]

title: Nvidia To Invest $100 Billion In OpenAI For Data Centers
description: Nvidia Corp. will invest as much as $100 billion in OpenAI to support the building of new data centers and the infrastructure needed to power artificial intelligence workloads. The two signed a letter of intent for a strategic deal, the companies said Monday in a statement. The investment is intended to help OpenAI build data centers with a capacity of 10 gigawatts of power using Nvidia’s advanced AI chips to train and deploy OpenAI’s models.
content:
Nvidia Corp. will invest as much as $100 billion in OpenAI to support the building of new data centers and the infrastructure needed to power artificial intelligence workloads.
The two signed a letter of intent for a strategic deal, the companies sai... [1215 chars]

title: California issues historic fine over lawyer’s ChatGPT fabrications
description: The court of appeals said 21 of 23 quotes in an opening brief were fake. State authorities are scrambling to grapple with widespread use of artificial intelligence.
content:
By Khari Johnson, CalMatters
The fine appears to be the largest issued over AI fabrications by a California court and came with a blistering opinion stating that 21 of 23 quotes from cases cited in the attorney’s opening brief were made up. It also n... [6355 chars]

title: Stocks Get Tech Lift as Nvidia Rekindles AI Hopes: Markets Wrap
description: (Bloomberg) -- Wall Street traders defied calls for a breather after a $15 trillion rally in stocks from April lows, with Nvidia Corp. boosting optimism on artificial intelligence after saying it will invest as much as $100 billion in OpenAI.
content:

title: Nvidia to invest US$100 billion in OpenAI
description: Chipmaker Nvidia plans to invest up to US$100 billion in artificial intelligence startup OpenAI under a new agreement.
content: Chipmaker Nvidia plans to invest up to US$100 billion in artificial intelligence startup OpenAI under a new agreement, the companies said on Monday, as competition intensifies among technology giants to secure access to energy and chips needed for AI... [850 chars]

title: New tool steers AI models to create materials with exotic quantum properties
description: The artificial intelligence models that turn text into images are also useful for generating new materials. Over the last few years, generative materials models from companies like Google, Microsoft, and Meta have drawn on their training data to help researchers design tens of millions of new materials.

title: Magnum ice cream company to use NotCo AI for new products
description: Unilever's Magnum ice cream business, set to publicly list in November, plans to use Chilean start-up NotCo's artificial intelligence to reformulate products and create new ones.
content: Magnum plans to use NotCo's AI to look at the calories in ice cream, make new plant-based products and help manage rising commodity costs, said Zbigniew Lewicki, chief research, design and innovation officer at the Magnum Ice Cream Company, in a stat... [1185 chars]
